categories: Category:Star Wars: The Official Starships & Vehicles Collection

nodes.text: Star Wars: The Official Starships & Vehicles Collection 79

The Official Starships & Vehicles Collection 79 is the seventy-ninth issue of the magazine by De Agostini. Like all issues, it includes a die-cast collectible model and is an officially licensed source of Star Wars information, under Lucas Licensing and the LucasBooks imprint. This issue includes information on Sebulba's Podracer.
